byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook Online; Goldman Sachs' decision to hold annual meeting in San Francisco is sign of importance of tech industry to company, which is confirmed by chairman and chief executive Lloyd C Blankfein's comments to reporters after the meeting.
lead_paragraph: The investment bank, eager to court technology businesses while a boom is luring billions of investor dollars, held its annual meeting in San Francisco.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Meeting in Bay Area Shows Appetite for Tech

snippet: The investment bank, eager to court technology businesses while a boom is luring billions of investor dollars, held its annual meeting in San Francisco.
